metadata.title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
metadata.description: The "minimum password age" policy should meet minimum requirements. This particular check looks for a minimum password age of 7 days.

criteria.comment: the value PASS_MIN_DAYS should be set to 7 in /etc/login.defs
